title: Traditional Ayurvedic Chinese Medicine treatment in Chennai
description: Chinese herbal medicine has a role to play in the treatment of many diseases or illnesses, especially in their chronic forms, and has a great deal to offer.
cleaned_text: Traditional Chinese Medicine TCM is slowly gaining popularity competing with traditional Indian systems of medicine. China always has two schools of medicine namely Allopathy and TCM. It is a system of medicine which is more than 2500 years old. It employs the fact that disease in the body comes on because of meridian ( energy ) channels that are blocked. It uses a dynamic process over material structure. It employs the use of herbal medicines which are predominantly plant based acupuncture, burning and reflexology. SERVICES OFFERED The Obvious Choice in Health Chennai Natural Treatment Clinic is an obvious choice when it comes to providing an alternative to allopathic treatment. We aim to provide an alternative source in healing chronic ailments based on holistic natural healing.
